common.invalidStringLength: The value must have between three or sixty four characters

register.title: Register
register.name: Name
register.emailDescription: Email to receive alerts. It doesn't need to be the google account email.
register.nameMinLenghtErrorMsg: Name length should be at least 3 characters.

security.title: Security
security.emailConfirmedText: Your email has been already confirmed.
security.emailNotConfirmedText: Your email has not been confirmed. You will not receive alerts until the email is confirmed.
security.logoutAllDevicesText: You will be logged out of all devices.
security.deactivateAccountText: You will deactivate your account and no longer receive alerts.
security.deactivateAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account?
security.deleteAccountText: Remove your account and all your data from the platform.
security.successMessageEmailSent: A confirmation email was sent to your email.
security.deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
security.confirmationEmailSend: We have sent you an email with the confirmation link valid for the next 24h. Please check your email.

createUpdate.name: Name
createUpdate.namePlaceHolder: Type a friendly name for alert
createUpdate.siteUriPlaceHolder: Type the site URL starting with http...
createUpdate.termPlaceholder: Type a term to fire the alert
createUpdate.regexInvalid: Regex must have between 1 or 512 characters. It should not start nor end with / (backslash) and not end it with 'gmi' or any variation of other regex flags.
createUpdate.regexExplanation: Regex at SiteWatcher are global, multi-line and case insensitive. It should not start nor end with / (backslash) and not end it with 'gmi' or any variation of other regex flags.

about.title: About
about.motivation1: SiteWatcher is a project born for study purposes, I wanted to build a system to learn about message queues, distributed cache, DDD, and architectural patterns. I have never before built a system from scratch, so I wanted this experience.
about.motivation2: I'm still learning a lot of things with it, and I have an extensive to-do list of things I want to improve or learn to apply here.
about.motivation3: The motivation besides the study purposes is that I don't like when I only discover that I ran out of water when I need water. My city water company doesn't have an email alert service to notify about maintenance or any other interruption in the water supply. So I have the idea to make a service that monitors others' websites and sends me email alerts based on a rule, then SiteWatcher was born.
